schema: Token holder can redeem token for underlying asset
note: 1 USDC = 1 USD redemption promise. Zach: 'a redemption promise contingent on Circle's access to its reserves'

schema: Reserve value >= outstanding token supply
note: Monthly reserve report. Zach: attestation cadence was monthly, crisis moved in hours

schema: Reserve balance independently verified by third party
note: Monthly attestation by Deloitte (previously Grant Thornton). Zach: 'every attestation report failed to surface SVB exposure'

schema: Reserve composition disclosed (asset types and percentages)
note: Circle discloses reserve breakdown (T-bills, repos, cash). Zach: disclosed but concentration risk was not salient

schema: Underlying assets held in custody by named custodian
note: Circle discloses banking/custody partners (BNY Mellon, etc). Zach: 'disclosed banking partners but not the segregation mechanics at each'

schema: Issuer licensed/registered with named financial regulator
note: Circle holds state money transmitter licenses. Zach: 'the stablecoin with the strongest regulatory profile'

schema: Issuer has authority to reverse/freeze transactions
note: USDC contract has blacklist function. Circle can freeze addresses.

schema: Token transfers are unrestricted (permissionless)
note: ERC-20 permissionless transfers (except blacklisted addresses)

schema: Blockchain is the authoritative ownership record
note: On-chain token balances are the ownership record for USDC

schema: Reconciliation performed at stated cadence (daily/weekly/monthly)
note: Monthly attestation cadence. Zach: 'Attestation cadence was monthly. The crisis moved in hours.'

schema: Settlement is final after N block confirmations
note: Zach: 'technical finality without economic finality is not finality for risk purposes' — token settled but value diverged 13% during SVB

schema: Token represents direct ownership of underlying asset
note: USDY is a yield-bearing tokenized note backed by short-term US Treasuries and bank demand deposits. True bearer asset — anyone can hold or transfer without KYC. blockchainIsMainLedger=yes.

schema: Reserve value >= outstanding token supply
note: Reserve proof page shows total reserve value backing outstanding USDY supply. Updated regularly.

schema: Reserve balance independently verified by third party
note: Ankura Trust serves as independent verification agent for USDY reserves. Periodic attestation reports published via Ondo documentation.

schema: Reserve composition disclosed (asset types and percentages)
note: Reserve composition disclosed on reserves page: short-term US Treasuries and bank demand deposits.

schema: Token holder can redeem token for underlying asset
note: USDY holders can redeem for USD. bearerRedemption=yes in asset database. One of few true bearer RWA tokens.

schema: Token transfers are unrestricted (permissionless)
note: unconditionalTransfers=yes. SPL token with permissionless transfers. No whitelist required — true bearer asset behavior.

schema: Blockchain is the authoritative ownership record
note: blockchainIsMainLedger=yes. On-chain Solana balances are the authoritative ownership record for USDY.

schema: Underlying assets held in custody by named custodian
note: Reserve assets held at regulated financial institutions. Custody details disclosed in Ondo documentation.

schema: Token represents a share in a fund or SPV
note: Each OUSG token represents a share in the Ondo I LP fund holding iShares Short Treasury Bond ETF (SHV). Qualified purchasers only.

schema: Reserve value >= outstanding token supply
note: Fund NAV backing outstanding OUSG supply published on product page.

schema: Token transfers restricted to whitelisted addresses only
note: Transfer-restricted to qualified purchasers who have completed onboarding. unconditionalTransfers=no.

schema: All token holders have passed KYC verification
note: All OUSG holders must complete Ondo's onboarding process including KYC/AML verification. Qualified purchasers only.

schema: Underlying assets held in custody by named custodian
note: Underlying SHV ETF shares held by regulated custodian. Custody details in Ondo documentation.

schema: NAV per token is $X as of [date]
note: NAV per OUSG token published on product page, derived from underlying SHV ETF valuation.

schema: Token represents a tracker certificate / synthetic exposure
note: Ondo GM tokens provide exposure to US public market securities. Tokens are backed 1:1 by underlying assets held by regulated broker-dealers. Non-US users only.

schema: Reserve value >= outstanding token supply
note: Tokens claimed to be backed 1:1 by underlying assets held at regulated broker-dealers and custodians.

schema: Token transfers restricted to whitelisted addresses only
note: Transfer-restricted to verified participants within the Ondo GM ecosystem. unconditionalTransfers=no.

schema: All token holders have passed KYC verification
note: All participants must complete KYC verification. Non-US users only, verified through Ondo's compliance process.

schema: Underlying assets held in custody by named custodian
note: Underlying stocks and ETFs held by regulated broker-dealers and custodians. Specific broker-dealer names disclosed to verified participants.

schema: Token represents a share in a fund or SPV
note: BUIDL token represents a share in the BlackRock USD Institutional Digital Liquidity Fund. Largest tokenized MMF with over $2.9B AUM.

schema: Off-chain register is the authoritative ownership record
note: Securitize serves as SEC-registered transfer agent maintaining the official share register. blockchainIsMainLedger=no — off-chain register is authoritative.

schema: Transfer agent is SEC-registered (or equivalent)
note: Securitize LLC is an SEC-registered transfer agent. Handles ownership tracking, issuance, and redemption for BUIDL.

schema: Reserve composition disclosed (asset types and percentages)
note: Fund invests in cash, US Treasury bills, and repurchase agreements. Composition disclosed via Securitize platform and fund documents.

schema: NAV per token is $X as of [date]
note: Daily NAV published via Securitize. Dividends distributed daily. Target $1.00 per share NAV.

schema: Token transfers restricted to whitelisted addresses only
note: Transfer-restricted to KYC-verified investors via Securitize. unconditionalTransfers=no.

schema: All token holders have passed KYC verification
note: All BUIDL holders must be verified through Securitize's KYC/AML compliance process.

schema: Token holder can redeem token for underlying asset
note: BUIDL shares redeemable for USD via Securitize platform. Instant USDC redemption facility also available.

schema: Underlying tokenized product has been independently assessed
note: BUIDL on Solana is cross-chain via Wormhole NTT (Native Token Transfer). Bridge security is a critical dependency — bridge compromise would affect Solana BUIDL holders.

schema: Token represents a share in a fund or SPV
note: Token represents a share in the Franklin OnChain U.S. Government Money Fund. Over $700M AUM, ~$23M on Solana. Managed by Franklin Templeton ($1.7T AUM).

schema: Product registered/approved under named regulation
note: SEC-registered investment company. Filed N-PORT, N-CSR, and prospectus with the SEC. One of the first SEC-registered funds to use blockchain for share record-keeping.

schema: Issuer licensed/registered with named financial regulator
note: Franklin Templeton is a publicly traded, SEC-registered investment company with over $1.7 trillion in assets under management.

schema: Off-chain register is the authoritative ownership record
note: Transfer agent record is the legal system of record. blockchainIsMainLedger=no. Blockchain used as supplementary record-keeping layer.

schema: Reserve composition disclosed (asset types and percentages)
note: Fund holds US government securities, cash, and repurchase agreements. Portfolio composition disclosed in SEC filings (N-PORT) and fund fact sheets.

schema: NAV per token is $X as of [date]
note: Daily NAV published. Franklin Templeton was one of the first issuers to put NAV data on-chain.

schema: Token transfers restricted to whitelisted addresses only
note: Transfer-restricted to KYC-verified investors. unconditionalTransfers=no.

schema: Fund/issuer financial statements audited per GAAS/IFRS
note: SEC-registered fund with annual audit. Financial statements filed via N-CSR with the SEC.

schema: Token represents a share in a fund or SPV
note: VBILL token represents a share in VanEck's tokenized treasury-bill fund. $100K minimum subscription. 0.20% management fee. Issued through Securitize.

schema: Off-chain register is the authoritative ownership record
note: Securitize serves as transfer agent. Off-chain share register is the legal record. blockchainIsMainLedger=no.

schema: Transfer agent is SEC-registered (or equivalent)
note: Securitize LLC is SEC-registered transfer agent, same as BlackRock BUIDL.

schema: NAV per token is $X as of [date]
note: NAV per token published. Fund holds T-bills and short-term government obligations.

schema: Token transfers restricted to whitelisted addresses only
note: Transfer-restricted to qualified investors. $100K minimum. unconditionalTransfers=no.

schema: Settlement timing gap between token and underlying is documented
note: Supports 24/7 minting via USDC, but underlying T-bill settlement follows traditional T+1 schedule. Settlement gap exists between instant token minting and underlying settlement.

schema: Issuer licensed/registered with named financial regulator
note: VanEck is an SEC-registered investment management firm founded in 1955.

schema: Token represents a tracker certificate / synthetic exposure
note: xStocks tokens are tracker certificates issued by Backed Assets (Swiss-based). Tokens track the price of underlying US-listed stocks and ETFs. Holder has a claim against Backed Assets, not direct ownership of the stock.

schema: Product registered/approved under named regulation
note: Issued under an EU-approved prospectus by Backed Assets. Key source of legal protection for holders. Prospectus details available on Backed Assets' legal page.

schema: Token transfers are unrestricted (permissionless)
note: unconditionalTransfers=yes. Holders can self-custody, trade on DEXes, and use as collateral in lending protocols. True permissionless SPL tokens.

schema: Underlying assets held in custody by named custodian
note: Underlying stocks held by a regulated custodian as specified in the EU-approved prospectus. Custodian details in prospectus documentation.

schema: Reserve value >= outstanding token supply
note: Tracker certificates backed 1:1 by underlying stocks as specified in the prospectus. Each token represents exposure to one share of the underlying.

schema: Issuer licensed/registered with named financial regulator
note: Backed Assets is a Swiss-based tokenization firm operating under Swiss financial regulation. EU prospectus approval provides additional regulatory framework.

schema: Token represents a tracker certificate / synthetic exposure
note: Tokenized US equities on Solana. Users deposit USDC to mint tokenized stocks (TSLA, AAPL, NVDA, etc.) at real-time prices.

schema: Reserve value >= outstanding token supply
note: Monthly proof-of-reserve audits claimed. Backing managed by regulated custodians in the UAE. thirdPartyAttestations=yes in asset database.

schema: Reserve balance independently verified by third party
note: Monthly proof-of-reserve audits by third-party verifier. Key differentiator for Remora. Actual audit reports should be available on their platform.

schema: Token transfers are unrestricted (permissionless)
note: unconditionalTransfers=yes. Tokens tradeable on DEXes, usable as LP liquidity, and postable as collateral.

schema: Underlying assets held in custody by named custodian
note: Backing managed by regulated custodians in the UAE. Specific custodian names not publicly disclosed — description says 'regulated custodians in the UAE'.

schema: Token represents direct ownership of underlying asset
note: Each GOLD token represents one ounce of physical gold. 1:1 backed by redeemable physical gold held in secure third-party vaults.

schema: Physical asset verified to exist at claimed storage location
note: Gold held in secure third-party vaults. Monthly third-party attestations claimed. UAE-based.

schema: Reserve balance independently verified by third party
note: Monthly third-party attestations claimed on the product. thirdPartyAttestations=yes in asset database. Actual attestation reports should be published on the platform.

schema: Token holder can redeem token for underlying asset
note: Mintable and redeemable via the Oro platform. 1% fee, T+2 USDC settlement for redemptions.

schema: Token transfers are unrestricted (permissionless)
note: unconditionalTransfers=yes. SPL token with permissionless transfers.

schema: Settlement timing gap between token and underlying is documented
note: T+2 USDC settlement for redemptions. Token transfers instant on Solana but underlying gold redemption takes T+2.

schema: Underlying assets held in custody by named custodian
note: Physical gold held in secure third-party vaults. UAE-based. Vault operator details should be disclosed in documentation.

schema: Token represents direct ownership of underlying asset
note: Gold-backed SPL Token-2022 on Solana. Each token backed by physical gold. titleDeed=yes.

schema: Underlying assets held in custody by named custodian
note: Gold custodied by Digital Kidu (https://www.digitalkidu.bt/), Bhutan's digital custody entity. Previously listed as 'Apex Custody' — corrected to actual custodian.

schema: Token holder can redeem token for underlying asset
note: bearerRedemption=yes. Token holders can redeem for physical gold through the TER platform.

schema: Blockchain is the authoritative ownership record
note: blockchainIsMainLedger=yes. Solana on-chain balances are the authoritative ownership record.

schema: Issuer has authority to reverse/freeze transactions
note: forcedTransfers=yes. Token-2022 with freeze authority. TER can freeze/force-transfer tokens.

schema: Token transfers restricted to whitelisted addresses only
note: unconditionalTransfers=no. Token-2022 with transfer restrictions.

schema: Token represents registered equity (stock) in a company
note: Platform for companies to issue SEC-registered equity directly on-chain. Tokens represent actual shares, not synthetic exposure. Recorded by Superstate's SEC-registered transfer agent.

schema: Transfer agent is SEC-registered (or equivalent)
note: Superstate operates as an SEC-registered transfer agent, handling ownership tracking, issuance, redemption, and dividends.

schema: Off-chain register is the authoritative ownership record
note: blockchainIsMainLedger=no. Superstate's transfer agent share register is the legal record of ownership.

schema: Token transfers restricted to whitelisted addresses only
note: unconditionalTransfers=no. SEC-registered equity requires transfer restrictions and KYC verification.

schema: All token holders have passed KYC verification
note: All holders KYC-verified through Superstate's compliance process. Required for SEC-registered equity issuance.

schema: Token represents direct ownership of underlying asset
note: Each token represents one pound of yellowcake (uranium oxide concentrate) stored at recognized conversion facilities. titleDeed=yes.

schema: Physical asset verified to exist at claimed storage location
note: Yellowcake stored at recognized conversion facilities. Unlike gold or financial assets, uranium custody requires specialized licensed facilities.

schema: Token holder can redeem token for underlying asset
note: Physical delivery available for verified institutional participants. Unique among tokenized commodities due to nuclear material handling requirements.

schema: Token transfers restricted to whitelisted addresses only
note: unconditionalTransfers=no. Restricted to verified institutional participants. Near-instant trading and settlement within the platform.

schema: Underlying assets held in custody by named custodian
note: Yellowcake stored at recognized conversion facilities — not crypto custodians like BitGo. Uranium custody is handled by specialized nuclear material facilities.
